buttons.label: Initialize Toolkit
buttons.tooltip: Loads all toolkit functions and prepares the environment.

buttons.label: Check Prerequisites
buttons.tooltip: Verifies that all required dependencies like SFDX CLI are installed.

buttons.label: Create Project
buttons.tooltip: Create a new DevOps project structure.

buttons.label: Select Project
buttons.tooltip: Select an existing project folder to work on.

buttons.label: Authorize an Org
buttons.tooltip: Connect the toolkit to a new Salesforce Org.

buttons.label: Select Orgs
buttons.tooltip: Set the source and destination orgs for your project.

buttons.label: Open Org
buttons.tooltip: Open the selected org in your default web browser.

buttons.label: Generate Delta Package
buttons.tooltip: Compare orgs and generate a package of differences.

buttons.label: Deploy Metadata
buttons.tooltip: Deploy the generated package to the destination org.

buttons.label: Validate Deployment
buttons.tooltip: Run a validation-only deployment to check for errors.

buttons.label: Show Toolkit State
buttons.tooltip: Display the current state of all toolkit variables.

buttons.label: Clear Console
buttons.tooltip: Clear all text from the output console.

buttons.label: View Log File
buttons.tooltip: Open the detailed log file for the current session.
